---
title: "Prework"

---

This course requires a computer with R and RStudio installed. Both are free and open source. Please see installation links below. No prior knowledge of R is required. Statistical knowledge is not required but may be helpful in the statistical modelling section.

## Installation links

### R

R can be downloaded and installed from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/)

::: {.callout-warning}
Version 4.3.1 or above is recommended.
:::

### RStudio Desktop

RStudio Desktop can be downloaded and installed from the [posit website](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)

::: {.callout-warning}
Version 2023.06 or above is recommended.
:::
